mapper.select: select * from guestbook2 order by idx
mapper.insert: insert into guestbook2(idx, name, subject, content, email, pwd, f_name, regdate) values(guestbook2_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{f_name}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update guestbook2 set name=#{name}, subject=#{subject}, email=#{email}, content=#{content}, f_name=#{f_name} where idx = #{idx}
